pr_title: Fix the issue with default locale extension for nested classes

timeline.message: Fix the issue with default locale extension for nested classes

timeline.bodyText:
The org.junit.platform.commons.util package is not exported by module org.junit.platform.commons. It's not listed in the API documentation: https://junit.org/junit5/docs/current/api/ and package-info.java comments reads:
https://github.com/junit-team/junit5/blob/e80e2854c3862eef3feb08c2dd6276833ef911bd/junit-platform-commons/src/main/java/org/junit/platform/commons/util/package-info.java#L1-L9
timeline.author: sormuras

replies.bodyText:
Good catch, thank you!
I wanted to use the method from AnnotationSupport but somehow one from AnnotationUtils was imported
replies.author: simonenkoi

timeline.message: Move tests for nested test classes into regular test class
Clarify why patch is not necessary for RepeatFailedTestExtension
Create tests verifying that system property extensions work with nested classes
